footer.ottroja-description: Ottroja is an online store offering the finest 100% pure natural honey, carefully extracted from local beehives and packaged according to the highest quality standards.

service1.title: 100% Quality Guaranteed
service1.description: We offer you raw, natural honey from trusted apiaries, with laboratory testing certificates.

service2.title: Ongoing offers and gifts
service2.description: Enjoy exclusive discounts and gifts on your first order, and follow us to find out about new offers.

service3.title: Fast and secure delivery
service3.description: We carefully package each order to ensure it reaches you in the best condition and as quickly as possible.

service4.title: Responsive customer support
service4.description: Our team is ready to serve you and answer your inquiries 7 days a week.

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our weekly newsletter and receive updates via email.

footer.rights: 2025 Aturjah Honey Store. All rights reserved.

wholesale.title: Buy in bulk
wholesale.sub_title: and be a partner in our success in spreading nature.
wholesale.description: At Ottroja, we offer you the ability to purchase in bulk the finest natural health and beauty products, from trusted and certified organic sources.

aboutPage.about-founder: Passionate about the world of natural honey and its health benefits, he was born out of a sincere desire to provide authentic and reliable products directly from the heart of nature to the consumer. After years of research and experimentation into the sources of mountain honey, sidr, and propolis, he founded ''Ottroja Page'' to be a specialized store that combines quality, honesty, and attention to the smallest details. His goal is to bring honey to every home, free of any additives or adulteration, and with the highest possible nutritional value.

choose-us.title: Why Choose ''Ottroja''
choose-us.content: Because at Ottroja, we don't just sell honey, we offer you an experience of trust and quality. We carefully select our sources from the finest natural apiaries. We believe that real honey is both a cure and a nourishment, so we make sure to present it as God created itâ€”raw, natural, and full of benefits.
choose-us.packaging-description: At Ottroja, we adhere to the highest standards of honesty and transparency. Every package undergoes meticulous inspection and packaging to ensure that the honey you receive is the same honey that came out of the beehive, without any processing or additives.
choose-us.quality: Quality guaranteed with real testimonials and reviews
choose-us.quality-description: Our products are tested and certified by trusted analytical laboratories, and we provide certificates of analysis upon request. We also take pride in our customers' repeated trust and honest feedback, documenting their experience with us, whether through store reviews or direct messages on various platforms.
choose-us.delivery: Safe and fast delivery to your door
choose-us.delivery-description: We partner with reliable shipping companies to ensure your order arrives as quickly as possible, in perfect condition, without delay or damage. We carefully package each package so it arrives exactly as it left us, and we provide tracking options so you can rest assured about your order every step of the way.
choose-us.support-description: Ottroja's customer service team is trained to respond to your inquiries quickly, respectfully, and in a friendly manner. We don't just provide a product; we accompany you after your purchase to ensure your complete satisfaction, responding to any comments as quickly as possible.

ourJourney.title: Our Journey
ourJourney.line1: We began in the heart of nature, amidst mountains and valleys and among beehives.
ourJourney.line2: We document our steps from source to packaging, sharing real moments from our journey to select the finest honey.
